rows.name: Absorbing Shield
rows.notes: +1 heavy steel; disintegrate on touch 1/2 days

rows.name: Adamantine Battleaxe
rows.notes: Masterwork; nonmagical

rows.name: Adamantine Breastplate
rows.notes: DR 2/–; nonmagical

rows.name: Adamantine Dagger
rows.notes: Masterwork; nonmagical

rows.name: Banded Mail of Luck
rows.notes: +3 banded; 1/week force an attack reroll

rows.name: Breastplate of Command
rows.notes: +2 breastplate; +2 competence to Cha checks & Leadership; morale aura to allies; cannot conceal to function

rows.name: Caster's Shield
rows.notes: +1 light wooden; reusable 1-spell strip (≤3rd) at 1/2 raw materials; 5% ASF
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, Scribe Scroll

rows.name: Celestial Armor
rows.notes: +3 chainmail; treated as light; Max Dex +8, ACP −2, ASF 15%; fly 1/day; good-aligned creator

rows.name: Darkwood Buckler
rows.notes: Light wooden; darkwood; 2.5 lb; no ACP; nonmagical

rows.name: Darkwood Shield
rows.notes: Heavy wooden; darkwood; 5 lb; no ACP; nonmagical

rows.name: Demon Armor
rows.notes: +4 full plate; claw attacks as +1; contagion on claw; bestows 1 negative level to nonevil wearer

rows.name: Ring of Djinni Calling
rows.notes: Calls a specific djinni 1 hour/day; becomes nonmagical if djinni dies

rows.name: Dwarven Plate
rows.notes: Full plate of adamantine; DR 3/–; nonmagical

rows.name: Dwarven Thrower
rows.notes: +2 warhammer; in dwarf hands +3 returning; thrown 30 ft; +2d8 vs giants or +1d8 vs others
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must be a dwarf of at least 10th level

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Air)
rows.notes: All elemental command common props + listed air powers; appears as ring of feather falling until condition met

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Earth)
rows.notes: All elemental command common props + listed earth powers; appears as ring of meld into stone until condition met

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Fire)
rows.notes: All elemental command common props + listed fire powers; appears as major ring of energy resistance (fire) until condition met

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Water)
rows.notes: All elemental command common props + listed water powers; appears as ring of water walking until condition met

rows.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Greater)
rows.notes: Energy type chosen at creation; resistance 30

rows.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Major)
rows.notes: Energy type chosen at creation; resistance 20

rows.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Minor)
rows.notes: Energy type chosen at creation; resistance 10

rows.name: Elven Chain
rows.notes: Mithral chainmail; treated as light; 20 lb; ASF 20%, Max Dex +4, ACP −2; nonmagical

rows.name: Ring of Evasion
rows.notes: Evasion as continuous effect

rows.name: Ring of Feather Falling
rows.notes: Immediate feather fall on falling >5 ft

rows.name: Flame Tongue
rows.notes: +1 flaming burst longsword; 1/day 4d6 fire ray (30 ft, ranged touch)
required_spells: flame blade or flame strike or fireball

rows.name: Ring of Force Shield
rows.notes: Generates heavy shield-sized wall of force; no ACP/ASF; on/off free action

rows.name: Ring of Freedom of Movement
rows.notes: Continuous freedom of movement

rows.name: Ring of Friend Shield (Pair)
rows.notes: Two rings; either wearer can cast shield other on the other (no range limit)

rows.name: Frost Brand
rows.notes: +3 frost greatsword; sheds light <0°F; absorb first 10 fire/heal per round; extinguish nonmagical fires; dispel lasting fire spells (CL check +14)

rows.name: Greater Slaying Arrow
rows.notes: +1 arrow keyed to a type/subtype; DC 23 or die; death effect if living; table determines keyed type

rows.name: Holy Avenger
rows.notes: +2 cold iron longsword (becomes +5 holy cold iron in paladin hands); SR 5+level to wielder & adjacent; area greater dispel magic 1/round

rows.name: Ring of Invisibility
rows.notes: Invisibility on command

rows.name: Javelin of Lightning
rows.notes: Becomes 5d6 lightning bolt when thrown (Ref DC 14 half); consumed on use

rows.name: Life-Drinker
rows.notes: +1 greataxe; bestows 2 negative levels on hit (DC 16 negates 1 day later); wielder also gains 1 negative level for 1 hour on each hit

rows.name: Lion's Shield
rows.notes: +2 heavy steel; lion head bites 3/day as free action using wielder BAB; 2d6 damage

rows.name: Luck Blade (0 Wishes)
rows.notes: +2 short sword; +1 luck to saves; 1/day reroll any roll

rows.name: Luck Blade (1 Wish)
rows.notes: +2 short sword; +1 luck to saves; 1/day reroll any roll; 1 wish stored

rows.name: Luck Blade (2 Wishes)
rows.notes: +2 short sword; +1 luck to saves; 1/day reroll any roll; 2 wishes stored

rows.name: Luck Blade (3 Wishes)
rows.notes: +2 short sword; +1 luck to saves; 1/day reroll any roll; 3 wishes stored

rows.name: Mace of Smiting
rows.notes: +3 adamantine heavy mace; +5 vs constructs; crit vs construct destroys; crit vs outsider ×4

rows.name: Mace of Terror
rows.notes: +2 heavy mace; 3/day 30-ft cone fear (Will DC 16 partial); −2 morale to saves for affected

rows.name: Masterwork Cold Iron Longsword
rows.notes: Masterwork; nonmagical

rows.name: Ring of Mind Shielding
rows.notes: Immune to detect thoughts, discern lies, alignment detection

rows.name: Mithral Full Plate of Speed
rows.notes: +1 mithral full plate; haste up to 10 rounds/day (any split); ASF 25%, Max Dex +3, ACP −3; treated as medium

rows.name: Mithral Heavy Shield
rows.notes: 5% ASF; no ACP; 5 lb; nonmagical

rows.name: Mithral Shirt
rows.notes: Mithral chain shirt; ASF 10%, Max Dex +6, ACP 0; treated as light; nonmagical

rows.name: Nine Lives Stealer
rows.notes: +2 longsword; 9 stored death effects on crit DC 20; evil; good wielders gain 2 negative levels while held

rows.name: Oathbow
rows.notes: +2 composite longbow (+2 Str); sworn enemy 1/day: becomes +5, +2d6, ×4 crit; only MW vs others; −1 attack with other weapons; 7-day oath lockout

rows.name: Plate Armor of the Deep
rows.notes: +1 full plate; unarmored for Swim; water breathing; tongues vs aquatic; communicate; theme: waves & fish

rows.name: Ring of Protection +1
rows.notes: Deflection bonus +1 to AC
rows.required_spells_note: Caster level at least three times ring bonus

rows.name: Ring of Protection +2
rows.notes: Deflection bonus +2 to AC
rows.required_spells_note: Caster level at least three times ring bonus

rows.name: Ring of Protection +3
rows.notes: Deflection bonus +3 to AC
rows.required_spells_note: Caster level at least three times ring bonus

rows.name: Ring of Protection +4
rows.notes: Deflection bonus +4 to AC
rows.required_spells_note: Caster level at least three times ring bonus

rows.name: Ring of Protection +5
rows.notes: Deflection bonus +5 to AC
rows.required_spells_note: Caster level at least three times ring bonus

rows.name: Ring of the Ram
rows.notes: 50 charges; ranged force head 1–3 charges (1d6/2d6/3d6), bull rush Str 25 (+1/+2), open doors Str 25/27/29

rows.name: Rapier of Puncturing
rows.notes: +2 wounding rapier; 3/day touch attack deals 1d6 Con damage (creatures immune to crits are immune)

rows.name: Ring of Regeneration
rows.notes: Regenerate lost parts; heals 1 hp/level per hour; nonlethal 1/level per 5 min; only for damage taken while worn

rows.name: Rhino Hide
rows.notes: +2 hide; −1 ACP; +2d6 damage on charges (incl. mounted)

rows.name: Ring of Animal Friendship
rows.notes: As if wearer had cast charm animal

rows.name: Ring of Blinking
rows.notes: Blink on command

rows.name: Ring of Chameleon Power
rows.notes: +10 Hide competence; disguise self at will as standard action

rows.name: Ring of Climbing
rows.notes: +5 competence bonus on Climb checks
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 5 ranks in Climb

rows.name: Ring of Climbing, Improved
rows.notes: +10 competence bonus on Climb checks
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 10 ranks in Climb

rows.name: Ring of Counterspells
rows.notes: Holds 1 spell (1st–6th); auto-counters if cast on wearer; then emptied

rows.name: Ring of Jumping
rows.notes: +5 competence bonus on Jump checks
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 5 ranks in Jump

rows.name: Ring of Jumping, Improved
rows.notes: +10 competence bonus on Jump checks
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 10 ranks in Jump

rows.name: Ring of Shooting Stars
rows.notes: Duplicate canonical name; (kept single normalized row above)

rows.name: Ring of Spell Storing
rows.notes: Holds spells up to 5 levels

rows.name: Ring of Spell Storing (Major)
rows.notes: Holds spells up to 10 levels

rows.name: Ring of Spell Storing (Minor)
rows.notes: Holds spells up to 3 levels

rows.name: Ring of Spell Turning
rows.notes: 3/day reflect next 9 spell levels as spell turning

rows.name: Ring of Sustenance
rows.notes: No food/water; sleep 2h for benefits; attune 1 week

rows.name: Ring of Telekinesis
rows.notes: Telekinesis on command

rows.name: Ring of Three Wishes
rows.notes: Holds 3 wishes in rubies (1d3 remaining when found); becomes nonmagical when spent

rows.name: Ring of Water Walking
rows.notes: Continuous water walk

rows.name: Ring of Wizardry I
rows.notes: Doubles 1st-level arcane spell slots

rows.name: Ring of Wizardry II
rows.notes: Doubles 2nd-level arcane spell slots

rows.name: Ring of Wizardry III
rows.notes: Doubles 3rd-level arcane spell slots

rows.name: Ring of Wizardry IV
rows.notes: Doubles 4th-level arcane spell slots

rows.name: Ring of X-Ray Vision
rows.notes: See through materials (limits apply); Con damage 1/min after first 10 minutes/day

rows.name: Screaming Bolt
rows.notes: +2 bolt; screams; enemies within 20 ft of path DC 14 Will or shaken (mind-affecting, fear)

rows.name: Shatterspike
rows.notes: +1 longsword; if wielder has Improved Sunder: +4 to opposed sunder rolls; can damage up to +4 weapons
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, Power Attack, Improved Sunder

rows.name: Shifter's Sorrow
rows.notes: +1/+1 two-bladed sword (alchemical silver); +2d6 vs shapechangers; on hit DC 15 Will or revert to natural form

rows.name: Silver Dagger, Masterwork
rows.notes: Alchemical silver; masterwork; nonmagical

rows.name: Sleep Arrow
rows.notes: +1 arrow; on hit forces DC 11 Will save or fall asleep; deals nonlethal instead of lethal

rows.name: Slaying Arrow
rows.notes: +1 arrow keyed to a type/subtype; DC 20 Fort or die/destroy; death effect if living; table determines keyed type

rows.name: Spined Shield
rows.notes: +1 heavy steel; also a spiked shield; 3/day fire a +1 spine (RI 120 ft, 1d10, 19–20/×2); spines regenerate daily

rows.name: Note: No staves/wondrous specific items included
rows.notes: Staves/wondrous unique items not available in provided text; index pending

rows.name: Sun Blade
rows.notes: Bastard sword sized; behaves as shortsword for proficiency; +2 normally, +4 vs evil; ×3 crit vs undead/NE plane; 1/day daylight radiance expanding globe; good-aligned; evil wielder gains 1 neg level

rows.name: Sword of Life Stealing
rows.notes: +2 longsword; on crit bestows 1 negative level; wielder gains 1d6 temp hp per negative level (24h)

rows.name: Sword of the Planes
rows.notes: +1 longsword (Material); +2 on Elemental planes & vs elementals; +3 on Astral/Ethereal & vs natives; +4 on other planes & vs outsiders

rows.name: Sword of Subtlety
rows.notes: +1 short sword; when making a sneak attack: +4 to attack and damage

rows.name: Sylvan Scimitar
rows.notes: +3 scimitar; outdoors in temperate climates: Cleave feat and +1d6 damage
rows.required_spells_note: Alternatively, creator may be a 7th-level druid

rows.name: Trident of Fish Command
rows.notes: +1 trident; 3/day charm up to 14 HD aquatic animals (Will DC 16; +5 if currently being attacked by wielder); speak with animals (aquatic); unwilling won't approach within 10 ft

rows.name: Trident of Warning
rows.notes: +2 trident; scan 680-ft hemisphere in 1 round to detect aquatic predators (location, depth, kind, number)

rows.name: Dagger of Venom
rows.notes: +1 dagger; 1/day apply poison effect on hit (free action same round), DC 14

rows.name: Winged Shield
rows.notes: +3 heavy wooden round; feathered wings; 1/day fly carrying wielder (60 ft ≤133 lb; 40 ft ≤266 lb)

rows.name: Ring of Swimming
rows.notes: Continuously grants a +5 competence bonus on Swim checks.
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 5 ranks in the Swim skill

rows.name: Ring of Swimming, Improved
rows.notes: Continuously grants a +10 competence bonus on Swim checks.
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 10 ranks in the Swim skill

rows.name: Staff of Abjuration
rows.notes: Spells: shield(1), resist energy(1), dispel magic(1), lesser globe of invulnerability(2), dismissal(2), repulsion(3).

rows.name: Staff of Charming
rows.notes: Spells: charm person(1), charm monster(2).

rows.name: Staff of Conjuration
rows.notes: Spells: unseen servant(1), summon swarm(1), stinking cloud(1), minor creation(2), cloudkill(2), summon monster VI(3).

rows.name: Staff of Defense
rows.notes: Spells: shield(1), shield of faith(1), shield other(1), shield of law(3).

rows.name: Staff of Divination
rows.notes: Spells: detect secret doors(1), locate object(1), tongues(1), locate creature(2), prying eyes(2), true seeing(3).

rows.name: Staff of Earth and Stone
rows.notes: Spells: passwall(1), move earth(1).

rows.name: Staff of Enchantment
rows.notes: Spells: sleep(1), Tasha’s hideous laughter(1), suggestion(1), crushing despair(2), mind fog(2), mass suggestion(3).

rows.name: Staff of Evocation
rows.notes: Spells: magic missile(1), shatter(1), fireball(1), ice storm(2), wall of force(2), chain lightning(3).

rows.name: Staff of Fire
rows.notes: Spells: burning hands(1), fireball(1), wall of fire(2).

rows.name: Staff of Frost
rows.notes: Spells: ice storm(1), wall of ice(1), cone of cold(2).

rows.name: Staff of Healing
rows.notes: Spells: lesser restoration(1), cure serious wounds(1), remove blindness/deafness(2), remove disease(3).

rows.name: Staff of Illusion
rows.notes: Spells: disguise self(1), mirror image(1), major image(1), rainbow pattern(2), persistent image(2), mislead(3).

rows.name: Staff of Illumination
rows.notes: Spells: dancing lights(1), flare(1), daylight(2), sunburst(3).

rows.name: Staff of Life
rows.notes: Spells: heal(1), raise dead(5).

rows.name: Staff of Necromancy
rows.notes: Spells: cause fear(1), ghoul touch(1), halt undead(1), enervation(2), waves of fatigue(2), circle of death(3).

rows.name: Staff of Passage
rows.notes: Spells: dimension door(1), passwall(1), phase door(2), greater teleport(2), astral projection(2).

rows.name: Staff of Power
rows.notes: +2 quarterstaff; +2 luck bonus to AC/saves; retributive strike. Spells: magic missile(1), ray of enfeeblement (heightened to 5th)(1), continual flame(1), levitate(1), lightning bolt (heightened to 5th)(1), fireball (heightened to 5th)(1), cone of cold(2), hold monster(2), wall of force (hemisphere only)(2), globe of invulnerability(2).
rows.required_feat: Craft Staff; Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Staff of Size Alteration
rows.notes: Spells: enlarge person(1), reduce person(1), shrink item(1), mass enlarge person(1), mass reduce person(1).

rows.name: Staff of Swarming Insects
rows.notes: Spells: summon swarm(1), insect plague(3).

rows.name: Staff of Transmutation
rows.notes: Spells: expeditious retreat(1), alter self(1), blink(1), polymorph(2), baleful polymorph(2), disintegrate(3).

rows.name: Staff of the Woodlands
rows.notes: +2 quarterstaff; pass without trace at will. Spells: charm animal(1), speak with animals(1), barkskin(2), wall of thorns(3), summon nature’s ally VI(3), animate plants(4).
rows.required_feat: Craft Staff; Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +1
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +2
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +3
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +4
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +5
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Natural Armor +1
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Natural Armor +2
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Natural Armor +3
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Natural Armor +4
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Natural Armor +5
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location
rows.notes: Functions as nondetection (DC 19 caster level check to overcome).

rows.name: Apparatus of Kwalish
rows.notes: Also requires Knowledge (architecture and engineering) 8 ranks.

rows.name: Bag of Holding (Type I)
rows.notes: Holds up to 250 lb.; volume limit 30 cu. ft. External weight 15 lb.

rows.name: Bag of Holding (Type II)
rows.notes: Holds up to 500 lb.; volume limit 70 cu. ft. External weight 25 lb.

rows.name: Bag of Holding (Type III)
rows.notes: Holds up to 1,000 lb.; volume limit 150 cu. ft. External weight 35 lb.

rows.name: Bag of Holding (Type IV)
rows.notes: Holds up to 1,500 lb.; volume limit 250 cu. ft. External weight 60 lb.

rows.name: Bag of Tricks (Gray)
rows.notes: Up to ten animals per week; one at a time; random.

rows.name: Bag of Tricks (Rust)
rows.notes: Up to ten animals per week; one at a time; random.

rows.name: Bag of Tricks (Tan)
rows.notes: Up to ten animals per week; one at a time; random.

rows.name: Belt, Monk’s
rows.notes: Also grants +1 daily Stunning Fist use; non-monks gain AC and unarmed damage of 5th-level monk.

rows.name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
rows.notes: Creator must be a dwarf. Grants darkvision 60 ft., stonecunning, Con +2, and save bonuses to non-dwarves.

rows.name: Boat, Folding
rows.notes: Creator must have Craft (shipmaking) 2 ranks. Three command words toggle box/boat/ship.

rows.name: Boots of Elvenkind
rows.notes: Grants +5 competence bonus on Move Silently checks; creator must be an elf.

rows.name: Boots of Striding and Springing
rows.notes: Also requires creator to have 5 ranks in Jump.

rows.name: Bracers of Archery, Greater
rows.required_feat: Craft Wondrous Item, Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Bracers of Archery, Lesser
rows.required_feat: Craft Wondrous Item, Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +1
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +2
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +3
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +4
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +5
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +6
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +7
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +8
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Broom of Flying
rows.notes: Flies up to 9 hours/day; 200 lb at 40 ft, 400 lb at 30 ft; can travel unattended to known destination within ~300 yards; speed 40 ft without rider.

rows.name: Candle of Invocation
rows.notes: Aligned; allies within 30 ft gain +2 morale to attacks/saves/skills when alignment matches; matching cleric counts as +2 levels for spells/day while burning; can be consumed to cast gate.

rows.name: Candle of Truth
rows.notes: Creates 5-ft-radius zone of truth (DC 13) for 1 hour while burning; snuffing ruins the candle.

rows.name: Cape of the Mountebank
rows.notes: 1/day dimension door; leaves smoke cloud at origin and destination.

rows.name: Carpet of Flying (5 ft. by 5 ft.)
rows.notes: Capacity 200 lb; speed 40 ft; average maneuverability; can hover; carrying up to double capacity reduces speed to 30 ft.

rows.name: Carpet of Flying (5 ft. by 10 ft.)
rows.notes: Capacity 400 lb; speed 40 ft; average maneuverability; can hover; carrying up to double capacity reduces speed to 30 ft.

rows.name: Carpet of Flying (10 ft. by 10 ft.)
rows.notes: Capacity 800 lb; speed 40 ft; average maneuverability; can hover; carrying up to double capacity reduces speed to 30 ft.

rows.name: Censer of Controlling Air Elementals
rows.notes: Lighting incense and speaking words summons 1 Large air elemental (as summon monster VI); with incense of meditation, summons an elder air elemental (as summon monster IX). Only one elemental at a time.

rows.name: Chaos Diamond
rows.notes: Each listed power usable 1d4/day. Nonchaotic possessor gains a negative level while possessed.

rows.name: Chime of Interruption
rows.notes: Struck 1/10 minutes; resonates 3 minutes; casters within 30 ft require Concentration check DC 15 + spell level for verbal-component spells.

rows.name: Chime of Opening
rows.notes: Opens/loosens targets in 1 round; 10 total uses; also dispels hold portal and arcane lock by casters <15th; silenced if under silence.

rows.name: Circlet of Blasting, Minor
rows.notes: 1/day searing light (3d8).

rows.name: Circlet of Blasting, Major
rows.notes: 1/day maximized searing light (5d8 → 40).

rows.name: Circlet of Persuasion
rows.notes: +3 competence bonus on all Charisma-based checks.

rows.name: Cloak of Arachnida
rows.notes: Spider climb effect; immunity to web entrapment; move through webs at half speed; 1/day cast web; +2 luck vs spider poison.

rows.name: Cloak of the Bat
rows.notes: +5 competence on Hide; hang from ceilings; fly as spell or polymorph to bat in darkness only; flight power then must recharge over like period.

rows.name: Cloak of Charisma +2
rows.notes: +2 enhancement to Charisma.

rows.name: Cloak of Charisma +4
rows.notes: +4 enhancement to Charisma.

rows.name: Cloak of Charisma +6
rows.notes: +6 enhancement to Charisma.

rows.name: Cloak of Displacement, Minor
rows.notes: Constant 20% miss chance (as displacement).

rows.name: Cloak of Displacement, Major
rows.notes: As displacement; total 15 rounds/day, split as desired.

rows.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
rows.notes: +5 competence on Hide; creator must be an elf.

rows.name: Cloak of Etherealness
rows.notes: Ethereal jaunt on command; up to 10 minutes/day, dismissible.

rows.name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
rows.notes: +3 natural armor; swim 60 ft; underwater breathing; tail spine attack 1d6 as secondary; arms can be freed without losing swim speed.

rows.name: Cloak of Resistance +1
rows.notes: Grants resistance bonus on all saves; creator level must be at least 3× bonus.

rows.name: Cloak of Resistance +2
rows.notes: Grants resistance bonus on all saves; creator level must be at least 3× bonus.

rows.name: Cloak of Resistance +3
rows.notes: Grants resistance bonus on all saves; creator level must be at least 3× bonus.

rows.name: Cloak of Resistance +4
rows.notes: Grants resistance bonus on all saves; creator level must be at least 3× bonus.

rows.name: Cloak of Resistance +5
rows.notes: Grants resistance bonus on all saves; creator level must be at least 3× bonus.

rows.name: Crystal Ball
rows.notes: Scrying device; Will DC 16 negates for target.

rows.name: Crystal Ball (See Invisibility)
rows.notes: As crystal ball; includes see invisibility.

rows.name: Crystal Ball (Detect Thoughts)
rows.notes: As crystal ball; includes detect thoughts (Will DC 13).

rows.name: Crystal Ball (Telepathy)
rows.notes: As crystal ball; telepathic communication and 1/day suggestion (DC 14).

rows.name: Crystal Ball (True Seeing)
rows.notes: As crystal ball; includes true seeing.

rows.name: Cube of Force
rows.notes: 10-ft cube personal wall of force; 36 charges renewed daily; face modes with charge/minute and speed limits; high damage drains extra charges.

rows.name: Cube of Frost Resistance
rows.notes: Creates 10-ft cube warm field (>=65°F) that absorbs cold attacks; collapses for 1 hour if it takes >50 cold damage in 1 round; destroyed if it absorbs >100 cold damage in 10 rounds.

rows.name: Deck of Illusions
rows.notes: 34 parchment cards; throwing a drawn card creates a controlled major image anchored within 30 ft of where it lands; dispelling or picking up the card ends the effect; incomplete decks are proportionally cheaper.

rows.name: Cubic Gate
rows.notes: Carnelian cube; each face keyed to a plane (one is Material). Press once: opens a gate to that plane. Press twice quickly: transports the user and adjacent creatures to that plane (others may resist, Will DC 23). Only one face can be active at a time.

rows.name: Daern’s Instant Fortress
rows.notes: Command word deploys a 20-ft-square, 30-ft-high adamantine tower; walls extend 10 ft into ground (HP 100, hardness 20). Only owner can open the door; can’t deactivate unless empty.

rows.name: Darkskull
rows.notes: Radiates an unhallow effect centered on the skull; no tied spell. Creator must be evil.

rows.name: Decanter of Endless Water
rows.notes: Command words: stream (1 gal/round), fountain (5 gal/round, 5-ft stream), geyser (20-ft, 30 gal/round; DC 12 Str to hold; 1d4 dmg to one target/round).

rows.name: Dimensional Shackles
rows.notes: Prevents extradimensional movement (as dimensional anchor, no save); fits Small–Large; DC 30 to break or slip.

rows.name: Drums of Panic
rows.notes: Pair of kettle drums; sounding both causes fear in creatures within 120 ft (except a 20-ft safe zone around the drums), Will DC 16 partial; 1/day; price is for the pair.

rows.name: Dust of Appearance
rows.notes: Handful coats 10-ft radius; reveals invisible creatures/objects, figments, mirror images; negates blur/displacement; targets take –30 Hide; lasts 5 minutes.

rows.name: Dust of Disappearance
rows.notes: Touched creature/object becomes invisible (as greater invisibility) for 2d6 rounds; not revealed by see invisibility or invisibility purge; dust of appearance reveals.

rows.name: Dust of Dryness
rows.notes: Up to 100 gallons of water becomes a pellet; smashing releases it. Against water subtype: Fort DC 18 or destroyed; 5d6 dmg on a successful save.

rows.name: Dust of Illusion
rows.notes: Sprinkling creates a disguise self glamer per the user's envisioned illusion; unwilling target Ref DC 11 avoids; lasts 2 hours.

rows.name: Dust of Tracelessness
rows.notes: Makes a 100-sq-ft room look long-abandoned; along a trail hides passage of up to 12 riders for 250 ft; increases Survival DC to track by +20; instantaneous.

rows.name: Efreeti Bottle
rows.notes: Open 1/day: 10% insane efreet attacks; 10% grants three wishes; 80% serves loyally up to 10 minutes/day (or until slain), then departs forever.

rows.name: Elemental Gem
rows.notes: Crush to summon a Large elemental of the attuned type under the user's control (as summon nature's ally V); gem color indicates element.

rows.name: Elixir of Fire Breath
rows.notes: Drink grants up to three 4d6 fire breath attacks (25-ft range, Reflex DC 13 half) within 1 hour.

rows.name: Elixir of Hiding
rows.notes: +10 competence bonus on Hide checks for 1 hour.

rows.name: Elixir of Love
rows.notes: Drinker becomes charmed (as charm person, Will DC 14 negates) by the first creature seen for 1d3 hours; target must be a Medium or smaller humanoid.

rows.name: Elixir of Sneaking
rows.notes: +10 competence bonus on Move Silently checks for 1 hour.

rows.name: Elixir of Swimming
rows.notes: creator must have 5 ranks in the Swim skill

rows.name: Eyes of Charming
rows.notes: Price for a pair; single lens reduces save DC to 10

rows.name: Eyes of the Eagle
rows.notes: Wearing only one lens causes 1 round of dizziness unless covering the other eye

rows.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Bronze Griffon
Figurine of Wondrous Power, Ebony Fly
rows.notes: Hippogriff statistics; cannot attack

rows.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Golden Lions
rows.notes: Pair of adult male lions; if slain cannot be used for 1 week

rows.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Ivory Goats
rows.notes: Set of three: Traveling, Travail, Terror with distinct functions

rows.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant
Figurine of Wondrous Power, Obsidian Steed
rows.notes: Good-aligned riders risk being carried to lower planes (10% per use)

rows.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Onyx Dog
rows.notes: Int 8; speaks Common; scent; +4 Spot & Search; darkvision 60 ft.; see invisibility

rows.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Serpentine Owl
rows.notes: Transforms to horned owl or giant owl; only three giant forms lifetime

rows.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Silver Raven
Glove of Storing
rows.notes: One glove stores a single item up to 20 lb.; free action to store/retrieve

rows.name: Golem Manual, Clay
rows.aura: Moderate conjuration, divination, enchantment, and transmutation
rows.notes: +5 competence to Craft checks to build body; supplies 1,540 XP; caster level counts +2 for crafting

rows.name: Golem Manual, Flesh
rows.notes: +5 competence to Craft checks; supplies 780 XP; caster level counts +1 for crafting

rows.name: Golem Manual, Iron
rows.notes: +5 competence to Craft checks; supplies 5,600 XP; caster level counts +4 for crafting

rows.name: Golem Manual, Stone
rows.notes: +5 competence to Craft checks; supplies 3,400 XP; caster level counts +3 for crafting

rows.name: Golem Manual, Stone (Greater)
rows.notes: +5 competence to Craft checks; supplies 7,640 XP

rows.name: Helm of Brilliance
rows.notes: Gems usable once: diamond (prismatic spray, DC 20), ruby (wall of fire), fire opal (fireball 10d6, Reflex DC 20 half), opal (daylight). While active: undead within 30 ft take 1d6/round (bluish light), command makes wielded weapon flaming (1 round to activate), fire resistance 30. If wearer takes magical fire damage (after resist) and fails Will DC 15, remaining gems detonate as spells; helm destroyed.

rows.name: Helm of Comprehend Languages and Read Magic
rows.notes: Understand any speech; read any language and magical writing; +5 competence on Decipher Script for incomplete/archaic/exotic texts.

rows.name: Helm of Telepathy
rows.notes: Detect thoughts at will; two-way telepathy with a creature you’re reading; 1/day suggestion (Will DC 14).

rows.name: Helm of Teleportation
rows.notes: Teleport 3/day as the spell.

rows.name: Helm of Underwater Action
rows.notes: Underwater vision ×5 normal distance (subject to obstructions). Command maintains globe of air to breathe.

rows.name: Heward’s Handy Haversack
rows.notes: Two side pouches (2 cu. ft./20 lb each) and main (8 cu. ft./80 lb); always weighs 5 lb. Desired item is always on top; retrieving is a move action and doesn’t provoke.

rows.name: Horn of Blasting
rows.notes: 40-ft cone: 5d6 sonic and deafen 2d6 rds (Fort DC 16 half/negates). Crystalline: 7d6 (Will DC 16 if held/worn). Extra magical uses same day: 20% cumulative chance to explode for 10d6 to blower.

rows.name: Horn of Blasting (greater)
rows.notes: As horn of blasting but 10d6 sonic, stun 1 rd and deafen 4d6 rds (Fort DC 19 half/negates); crystalline 16d6. 20% cumulative chance to explode on extra uses.

rows.name: Horn of Fog
rows.notes: Blows forth obscuring mist: creates a 10-ft square/round while blowing; fog travels 10 ft/round from source; dissipates after 3 minutes (faster in wind).

rows.name: Horn of Goodness/Evil
rows.notes: 1/day; produces magic circle matching wielder’s alignment (good or evil) for 1 hour. No effect if wielder is neither good nor evil.

rows.name: Horn of the Tritons
rows.notes: 1/day (tritons 3/day). Options: calm rough waters (1-mile radius), attract helpful sea creatures, or panic Int 1–2 aquatic creatures (Will DC 16 partial). Audible to tritons within 3 miles. Creator must be a triton or have a triton’s aid.

rows.name: Horn of Valhalla (silver)
rows.notes: 1/7 days; summons 2d4+2 2nd-level human barbarian constructs with starting gear; obey for up to 1 hour.

rows.name: Horn of Valhalla (brass)
rows.notes: 1/7 days; summons 2d4+1 3rd-level human barbarian constructs. Prerequisite to use: spellcaster level 1st.

rows.name: Horn of Valhalla (bronze)
rows.notes: 1/7 days; summons 2d4 4th-level human barbarian constructs. Prereq to use: proficiency with all martial weapons or bardic music.

rows.name: Horn of Valhalla (iron)
rows.notes: 1/7 days; summons 1d4+1 5th-level human barbarian constructs. Prereq to use: proficiency with all martial weapons or bardic music.

rows.name: Horseshoes of Speed
rows.notes: Set of four; +30 ft enhancement to base land speed while all are worn; jump distances scale with speed.

rows.name: Horseshoes of a Zephyr
rows.notes: Set of four; horse runs ~4 inches above surfaces; crosses water/lava/unstable ground; leaves no tracks.

rows.name: Incense of Meditation
rows.notes: Burn 8 hours; a divine caster who prays/meditates nearby prepares all spells as if Maximized for the next 24 hours (no slot level increase).

rows.name: Ioun Stone (pearlescent spindle)
rows.notes: Sustains creature without food or water.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (dusty rose prism)
rows.notes: +1 insight bonus to AC.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (deep red sphere)
rows.notes: +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (incandescent blue sphere)
rows.notes: +2 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (pale blue rhomboid)
rows.notes: +2 enhancement bonus to Strength.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (pink rhomboid)
rows.notes: +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (pink and green sphere)
rows.notes: +2 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (scarlet and blue sphere)
rows.notes: +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (dark blue rhomboid)
rows.notes: Alertness (as the feat).

rows.name: Ioun Stone (vibrant purple prism)
rows.notes: Stores 3 spell levels (as a ring of minor spell storing).

rows.name: Ioun Stone (iridescent spindle)
rows.notes: Sustains creature without air.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (pale lavender ellipsoid)
rows.notes: Absorbs spells of 4th level or lower on a readied action; burns out after 20 spell levels (turns dull gray).

rows.name: Ioun Stone (pearly white spindle)
rows.notes: Regenerates 1 hp/hour (like ring of regeneration; only damage taken while using the stone).

rows.name: Ioun Stone (pale green prism)
rows.notes: +1 competence bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks, and ability checks.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (orange prism)
rows.notes: +1 caster level.

rows.name: Ioun Stone (lavender and green ellipsoid)
rows.notes: Absorbs spells of 8th level or lower on a readied action; burns out after 50 spell levels.

rows.name: Iron Bands of Bilarro
rows.notes: Command-activated; thrown ranged touch to bind one Large or smaller creature, immobilizing until released by command. Target can break (Str DC 30) or escape (Escape Artist DC 30). Usable 1/day.

rows.name: Iron Flask
rows.notes: 1/day command forces a creature from another plane (Will DC 19 negates) within 60 ft into the flask; releasing with command forces 1 hour of service; otherwise creature acts normally (likely hostile). Repeated capture of same creature: +2 on its save and becomes hostile. Random contents possible (see table in text).

rows.name: Keoghtom’s Ointment
rows.notes: Jar with 5 applications. Each use: neutralize poison, remove disease, or cure 1d8+5 hp (as cure light wounds).

rows.name: Lantern of Revealing
rows.notes: As hooded lantern; while lit, reveals invisible creatures/objects within 25 ft (as invisibility purge).

rows.name: Lens of Detection
rows.notes: +5 competence on Search and +5 on Survival checks to track.

rows.name: Lyre of Building
rows.notes: 1/day for 30 minutes: negates attacks vs inanimate constructions in 300 ft (incl. horn of blasting, disintegrate, siege). 1/week: 30 minutes of playing performs work equal to 100 humans × 3 days; after first hour, DC 18 Perform (strings) each hour or must stop.

rows.name: Mantle of Faith
rows.notes: Grants DR 5/evil to the wearer.

rows.name: Mantle of Spell Resistance
rows.notes: Wearer has SR 21.

rows.name: Manual of Bodily Health
rows.notes: Read 48 hours over ≥6 days to gain inherent +1 to +5 Constitution; book then becomes nonmagical. Prices: +1 27,500; +2 55,000; +3 82,500; +4 110,000; +5 137,500 gp.

rows.name: Manual of Gainful Exercise
rows.notes: Read 48 hours over ≥6 days to gain inherent +1 to +5 Strength; book then becomes nonmagical. Prices: +1 27,500; +2 55,000; +3 82,500; +4 110,000; +5 137,500 gp.

rows.name: Manual of Quickness of Action
rows.notes: Read 48 hours over ≥6 days to gain inherent +1 to +5 Dexterity; book then becomes nonmagical. Prices: +1 27,500; +2 55,000; +3 82,500; +4 110,000; +5 137,500 gp.

rows.name: Mask of the Skull
rows.notes: After worn ≥1 hour, 1/day the mask flies up to 50 ft and makes a touch attack (using wearer’s BAB): target Fort DC 20 or die (finger of death); on save takes 3d6+13 damage; then returns. Mask AC 16, hp 10, hardness 6.

rows.name: Mattock of the Titans
rows.notes: Huge+ user can loosen/tumble earth (10-ft cube/10 min) or smash rock (10-ft cube/hour). As weapon: Gargantuan +3 adamantine warhammer (4d6 base). Cost to craft: 13,348 gp + 800 XP.
rows.required_feat: Craft Wondrous Item, Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Maul of the Titans
rows.notes: +3 greatclub that deals triple damage to inanimate objects; requires Str 18 to wield without –4 penalty. Cost to craft: 12,305 gp + 480 XP.
rows.required_feat: Craft Wondrous Item, Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Medallion of Thoughts
rows.notes: Wearer can use detect thoughts.

rows.name: Mirror of Life Trapping
rows.notes: Activate/deactivate by command. Has 15 extradimensional cells. Any creature within 30 ft seeing its reflection must make Will DC 23 or be trapped (constructs/undead unaffected); gear remains behind. Owner can converse with a prisoner’s reflection or free by specific command words. If capacity exceeded, a random prisoner is freed. Breaking the mirror frees all prisoners.

rows.name: Mirror of Mental Prowess
rows.notes: Functions by command: read thoughts of a reflected creature (within 25 ft), clairvoyance viewing (incl. other planes if familiar), create portal to viewed place (remains 24 hours; can close by command; return via invisible portal; others can follow). 1/week answers one short question about a shown creature (as legend lore).

rows.name: Mirror of Opposition
rows.notes: Command-activated. A viewer’s reflection creates an exact duplicate that immediately attacks the original; duplicate has all possessions and powers. Upon defeat of either, duplicate and its items vanish. Up to 4 uses/day.

rows.name: Murlynd’s Spoon
rows.notes: Placed in an empty vessel, produces nourishing gruel sufficient to feed up to four humans per day.

rows.name: Necklace of Adaptation
rows.notes: Creates shell of fresh air: wearer breathes in any environment and is immune to harmful vapors/gases and inhaled poisons.

rows.name: Necklace of Fireballs (Type I)
rows.notes: Contains 3 spheres: one 5d6 and two 3d6 fireballs (Reflex DC 14 half). Each bead detachable by wearer and thrown up to 70 ft. Individual sphere cost 150 gp per die. If wearer fails save vs magical fire, necklace saves at +7 or remaining beads detonate.

rows.name: Necklace of Fireballs (Type II)
rows.notes: Contains 5 spheres: one 6d6, two 4d6, two 2d6.

rows.name: Necklace of Fireballs (Type III)
rows.notes: Contains 7 spheres: one 7d6, two 5d6, four 3d6.

rows.name: Necklace of Fireballs (Type IV)
rows.notes: Contains 7 spheres: one 8d6, two 6d6, two 4d6, two 2d6.

rows.name: Necklace of Fireballs (Type V)
rows.notes: Contains 7 spheres: one 9d6, two 7d6, two 5d6, two 3d6.

rows.name: Necklace of Fireballs (Type VI)
rows.notes: Contains 9 spheres: one 10d6, two 8d6, two 6d6, four 4d6.

rows.name: Necklace of Fireballs (Type VII)
rows.notes: Contains 7 spheres: one 10d6, two 9d6, two 7d6, two 5d6.

rows.name: Nolzur’s Marvelous Pigments
rows.notes: Create real, permanent nonmagical objects by painting. One pot creates up to 1,000 cu. ft over 100 sq. ft of surface. Can’t create creatures or magic items; valuables are base metals/fakes; may create mundane items up to 2,000 gp value. Craft (painting) DC 15; 10 minutes per object.

rows.name: Orb of Storms
rows.notes: 1/day control weather; 1/month storm of vengeance; continuous endure elements for possessor.

rows.name: Pearl of Power (1st-level)
rows.notes: 1/day recall a prepared 1st-level spell. Creator must be able to cast spells of the level to be recalled.

rows.name: Pearl of Power (2nd-level)
rows.notes: 1/day recall a prepared 2nd-level spell. Creator must be able to cast spells of the level to be recalled.

rows.name: Pearl of Power (3rd-level)
rows.notes: 1/day recall a prepared 3rd-level spell.

rows.name: Pearl of Power (4th-level)
rows.notes: 1/day recall a prepared 4th-level spell.

rows.name: Pearl of Power (5th-level)
rows.notes: 1/day recall a prepared 5th-level spell.

rows.name: Pearl of Power (6th-level)
rows.notes: 1/day recall a prepared 6th-level spell.

rows.name: Pearl of Power (7th-level)
rows.notes: 1/day recall a prepared 7th-level spell.

rows.name: Pearl of Power (8th-level)
rows.notes: 1/day recall a prepared 8th-level spell.

rows.name: Pearl of Power (9th-level)
rows.notes: 1/day recall a prepared 9th-level spell.

rows.name: Pearl of Power (two spells/day)
rows.notes: Recall two prepared spells/day, each of a different level, 6th or lower.

rows.name: Pearl of the Sirines
rows.notes: Allows breathing underwater as in air; grants swim speed 60 ft; no hindrance to casting/acting underwater.

rows.name: Periapt of Health
rows.notes: Wearer is immune to disease, including supernatural diseases.

rows.name: Periapt of Proof against Poison
rows.notes: Wearer is immune to poison; poisons already active when donned still run their course.

rows.name: Periapt of Wisdom +2
rows.notes: +2 enhancement to Wisdom.

rows.name: Periapt of Wisdom +4
rows.notes: +4 enhancement to Wisdom.

rows.name: Periapt of Wisdom +6
rows.notes: +6 enhancement to Wisdom.

rows.name: Periapt of Wound Closure
rows.notes: Automatically stabilizes wearer at –1 to –9 hp; doubles natural healing or enables normal healing where it wouldn’t; negates hp-bleed effects (not Con-bleed).

rows.name: Phylactery of Faithfulness
rows.notes: Warns wearer about actions/items that would harm alignment or standing with deity (including magical effects) if they pause to contemplate.

rows.name: Phylactery of Undead Turning
rows.notes: Wearer turns undead as if 4 levels higher. Prereq to craft: 10th-level cleric.

rows.name: Pipes of Haunting
rows.notes: DC 15 Perform (wind) to play; within 30 ft, Will DC 13 or frightened for 4 rounds; creatures with 6+ HD unaffected; 2/day.

rows.name: Pipes of Pain
rows.notes: DC 15 Perform (wind) to fascinate (Will DC 14 negates; mind-affecting sonic compulsion). When playing stops, listeners take 1d4 dmg/round for 2d4 rounds unless in total silence; sonic damage is doubled; then they become shaken by any noise (curse). Creator must have bardic music.

rows.name: Pipes of the Sewers
rows.notes: Attracts 1d3 rat swarms within 400 ft (delay 1 round/50 ft). Must keep playing; DC 10 Perform (wind) to control by telepathy or they turn on piper; control check each round if contested. Re-calling within a day: DC 15. Creator must have wild empathy.

rows.name: Pipes of Sounding
rows.notes: When played by someone with Perform (wind), creates sounds as ghost sound (CL 2nd).

rows.name: Portable Hole
rows.notes: 6-ft diameter cloth creates a 10-ft-deep extradimensional space. Air lasts 10 minutes for 1 Medium or 2 Small creatures. Interactions with bag of holding cause rifts/gates to Astral Plane destroying items and drawing creatures within 10 ft.

rows.name: Quaal’s Feather Token (Anchor)
rows.notes: Moor a craft in water; renders it immobile for up to 1 day. Single-use.

rows.name: Quaal’s Feather Token (Bird)
rows.notes: Delivers a small written message unerringly to a designated target; lasts as long as needed to carry the message. Single-use.

rows.name: Quaal’s Feather Token (Fan)
rows.notes: Creates a huge flapping fan to propel one ship (~25 mph) or lessen existing winds; functions up to 8 hours; does not work on land. Single-use.

rows.name: Quaal’s Feather Token (Swan Boat)
rows.notes: Creates a swanlike boat (speed 60 ft.) carrying 8 horses & gear or 32 Medium creatures (or equivalent); lasts 1 day. Single-use.

rows.name: Quaal’s Feather Token (Tree)
rows.notes: Creates a great oak (5-ft trunk, 60-ft height, 40-ft top diameter). Instantaneous. Single-use.

rows.name: Quaal’s Feather Token (Whip)
rows.notes: Becomes a dancing whip for up to 1 hour: +10 base attack, 1d6+1 damage, +1 enhancement, and free grapple (+15) on hit. Single-use.

rows.name: Quiver of Ehlonna
rows.notes: Three nondimensional compartments: up to 60 arrow-sized items, 18 javelin-sized, 6 bow/spear/staff-sized; always produces desired item; weight constant.

rows.name: Ring Gates
rows.notes: Paired 18" iron rings. Within 100 miles on same plane, anything put through one emerges from the other. Up to 100 lb/day total. Reach/attack/cast through; Small can slip through (DC 13 Escape Artist); Tiny or smaller pass freely. Entry/exit sides are marked.

rows.name: Robe of the Archmagi
rows.notes: +5 armor bonus; SR 18; +4 resistance on saves; +2 enhancement on caster level checks to overcome SR. Alignment keyed (white=good, gray=neutral, black=evil); wrong alignment imposes negative levels while worn; creator must share alignment.

rows.name: Robe of Blending
rows.notes: +10 competence bonus on Hide; at-will disguise self; friends/acquaintances see wearer normally.

rows.name: Robe of Bones
rows.notes: Robe bears patches that become uncontrolled undead when detached (1/round). New robe has 2 each: Small goblin skeleton; Medium human commoner skeleton; Medium wolf skeleton; Small goblin zombie; Medium human commoner zombie; Medium wolf zombie.

rows.name: Robe of Eyes
rows.notes: See in all directions; darkvision 120 ft; sees invisible/ethereal within 120 ft; +10 competence on Search & Spot; retain Dex to AC when flat-footed; cannot be flanked; cannot avert/close eyes vs gazes. Light/continual flame blinds 1d3 min; daylight blinds 2d4 min.

rows.name: Robe of Scintillating Colors
rows.notes: Command (1-round start), up to 10 rounds/day: 30-ft pattern gaze dazes 1d4+1 (Will DC 16 negates; mind-affecting pattern); grants increasing concealment 10%/round to 50%; sheds light in 30-ft radius.

rows.name: Robe of Stars
rows.notes: Travel physically to the Astral Plane (with gear); +1 luck bonus on all saves; up to six embroidered stars become +5 shuriken (proficiency granted), each vanishes after use.

rows.name: Robe of Useful Items
rows.notes: Has patches that become real items when detached (1/round). Always includes 2 each: dagger, bullseye lantern (filled/lit), 2’×4’ mirror, 10-ft pole, 50-ft hemp rope, sack. Plus 4d4 random patches by table. Used patches don’t reappear.

rows.name: Rope of Climbing
rows.notes: 60-ft rope supports 3,000 lb; on command moves 10 ft/round to attach/unfasten/return; can knot itself (every 1 ft), shortening to 50 ft and reducing Climb DC by 10; must hold one end to invoke.

rows.name: Rope of Entanglement
rows.notes: 30-ft rope lashes 20 ft forward or 10 ft up to entangle; break DC 20 or Escape Artist DC 20. AC 22, hp 12, hardness 10, DR 5/slashing; self-repairs 1 hp/5 min; destroyed if severed.

rows.name: Salve of Slipperiness
rows.notes: +20 competence on Escape Artist; ignore webs/restraints; smeared surfaces act as long-lasting grease; lasts 8 hours (remove with alcohol). Required to coat flasks that hold sovereign glue.

rows.name: Scabbard of Keen Edges
rows.notes: Shrinks/enlarges to fit up to greatsword; up to 3/day casts keen edge on a blade placed within.

rows.name: Scarab of Protection
rows.notes: SR 20; absorbs 12 total effects of energy drain, death effects, or negative energy then turns to powder.

rows.name: Scarab, Golembane
rows.notes: Detects golems within 60 ft with concentration; wearer’s weapon/unarmed/natural attacks ignore golem DR. Creator must be at least 10th level.

rows.name: Shrouds of Disintegration
rows.notes: Burial wrappings that, on command, turn a body placed inside to dust. One-use; then becomes ordinary cloth.

rows.name: Silversheen
rows.notes: Apply to a weapon (or 20 ammo) as a standard action; gains alchemical silver properties for 1 hour, replacing other special materials.

rows.name: Slippers of Spider Climbing
rows.notes: Move on walls/ceilings at speed 20 ft; fails on severely slippery surfaces; usable 10 minutes/day (split up).

rows.name: Sovereign Glue
rows.notes: Permanent adhesive; 1 oz covers 1 sq. ft., sets in 1 round. Must be stored in flask lined with salve of slipperiness and re-lined within 1 round after pouring. Only universal solvent dissolves the bond. Price is per ounce.

rows.name: Stone of Alarm
rows.notes: Affixes to an object on command; later touch without command word triggers a piercing screech for 1 hour (audible up to 1/4 mile barring barriers).

rows.name: Stone of Controlling Earth Elementals
rows.notes: Speak summoning words (1 full round) to call a Huge earth elemental (as summon monster VII; appears in 1d4 rounds). Using sand/rough unhewn stone instead calls a Large elemental (as summon monster VI). Only one at a time; requires new patch of earth/stone after prior elemental is gone.

rows.name: Stone of Good Luck (Luckstone)
rows.notes: +1 luck bonus on saving throws, ability checks, and skill checks.

rows.name: Stone Horse (Courser)
rows.notes: Rough stone horse animates on command (heavy horse stats, hardness 10); carries 1,000 lb tirelessly. Repair by stone to flesh then normal healing; reverts to stone when fully healed. Feeding gems while stone heals 1 hp/50 gp.

rows.name: Stone Horse (Destrier)
rows.notes: As courser but with heavy warhorse stats (hardness 10); same healing/feeding rules.

rows.name: Stone Salve
rows.notes: Apply 1 oz to petrified flesh: stone to flesh. Apply 1 oz to living flesh: stoneskin. Price is per ounce.

rows.name: Strand of Prayer Beads (Lesser)
rows.notes: Reveals powers when owner casts a divine spell. Includes bead of blessing (spell-trigger bless) and bead of healing (spell-trigger cure serious wounds/remove blindness-deafness/remove disease). Each 1/day; power lost if bead removed.

rows.name: Strand of Prayer Beads (Standard)
rows.notes: Beads: healing (as lesser), karma (+4 caster level for 10 minutes; any divine caster), smiting (spell-trigger: chaos hammer/holy smite/order’s wrath/unholy blight, Will DC 17 partial). Each 1/day; power lost if bead removed.

rows.name: Strand of Prayer Beads (Greater)
rows.notes: Beads: healing (as lesser), karma (+4 caster level 10 min), summons (gate once, then becomes nonmagical), wind walking (spell-trigger wind walk). Each 1/day unless noted; power lost if bead removed.

rows.name: Tome of Clear Thought +1
rows.notes: Read 48 hours over ≥6 days to gain +1 inherent bonus to Intelligence; book then becomes mundane. Inherent bonus grants extra skill points on future level-ups. (Aura noted as strong evocation if miracle is used.)

rows.name: Tome of Clear Thought +2
rows.notes: As +1, but +2 inherent bonus to Intelligence.

rows.name: Tome of Clear Thought +3
rows.notes: As +1, but +3 inherent bonus to Intelligence.

rows.name: Tome of Clear Thought +4
rows.notes: As +1, but +4 inherent bonus to Intelligence.

rows.name: Tome of Clear Thought +5
rows.notes: As +1, but +5 inherent bonus to Intelligence.

rows.name: Tome of Leadership and Influence +1
rows.notes: Read 48 hours over ≥6 days to gain +1 inherent bonus to Charisma; book then mundane.

rows.name: Tome of Leadership and Influence +2
rows.notes: As +1, but +2 inherent bonus to Charisma.

rows.name: Tome of Leadership and Influence +3
rows.notes: As +1, but +3 inherent bonus to Charisma.

rows.name: Tome of Leadership and Influence +4
rows.notes: As +1, but +4 inherent bonus to Charisma.

rows.name: Tome of Leadership and Influence +5
rows.notes: As +1, but +5 inherent bonus to Charisma.

rows.name: Tome of Understanding +1
rows.notes: Read 48 hours over ≥6 days to gain +1 inherent bonus to Wisdom; book then mundane.

rows.name: Tome of Understanding +2
rows.notes: As +1, but +2 inherent bonus to Wisdom.

rows.name: Tome of Understanding +3
rows.notes: As +1, but +3 inherent bonus to Wisdom.

rows.name: Tome of Understanding +4
rows.notes: As +1, but +4 inherent bonus to Wisdom.

rows.name: Tome of Understanding +5
rows.notes: As +1, but +5 inherent bonus to Wisdom.

rows.name: Unguent of Timelessness
rows.notes: Applied to once-living matter (leather, paper, wood, etc.): each real year counts as 1 day; coated object gains +1 resistance on all saves; effect permanent unless dispelled. One flask coats eight Medium objects (Large=2, Huge=4).

rows.name: Universal Solvent
rows.notes: Dissolves sovereign glue, tanglefoot bag adhesive, and kuo-toa adhesive. Apply as a standard action.

rows.name: Vest of Escape
rows.notes: Hidden lockpicks grant +4 competence on Open Lock; +6 competence on Escape Artist.

rows.name: Vestment, Druid’s
rows.notes: Worn over clothing/armor; wearer with wild shape gains one additional use per day. Creator needs polymorph or the wild shape ability.

rows.name: Well of Many Worlds
rows.notes: Looks like a portable hole. Anything placed within is sent to another world/plane (DM/random). Moving it randomizes destination again. Two-way portal allows ingress from the other side.

rows.name: Wind Fan
rows.notes: Command word to produce gust of wind 1/day safely; additional uses same day risk 20% cumulative chance per use to tear into useless tatters.

rows.name: Wings of Flying
rows.notes: Cloak transforms into bat/bird wings on command; fly speed 60 ft (good).
